Message:
If someone actually
comes to see me,
how should I greet them?
How should I talk to them?

The only relationship
I know is the one between
a master and their apprentice.

...And besides, there’s no way
someone like me could ever
teach anyone...

...let alone guide an apprentice
like my master once had.

With how incompetent I am,
I might not even be able to
protect them in the face
of danger.

I struggled to find the confidence
I needed within myself,
but then, the one that
appeared before me...
